attr.title: Haque
attr.desc: Haque is a glitch fantasy roguelike adventure about cute monsters, low-bit hauntings, and a suspiciously talkative narrator. Choose your character and battle through forests, deserts and dungeons to defeat a mysterious evil. Die often. Try again!
attr.inst: Buy the game on Steam or Itch.io and copy all the data to `haque/assets`. On first run the game will be patched.
